review: Dr Rashmi is very friendly and co operative. Really understands a senior citizens problem. She arranged for new teeth implantation with reasonable price. Yesterday Dr Sandeep perfectly fitted the teeth. Perfect hands as a best dentist have. Thanks for all your help and support

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Rashmi is one of the most amazing dentists that has taken care of my tooth issues. She is warm, welcoming and quickly puts you at ease. Very professional, hygienic and gentle handling. They really know how to take great care of their patients! I highly highly recommend Dr Rashmi and her clinic Tooth Affair!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Dental Fillings,RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Dental X-Ray,Ceramic Braces Fixing,Wisdom Tooth Extraction,
review: *** ****** ** ****** *** **** ******* * **** **** **** ** ** ***. She explains the issues clearly, is considerate of your requirements, and executes her work with near-perfection standards. I don’t generally write reviews, but this time it seems wrong not to let the world know that we have a great dentist here in Bangalore.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Went for filling a cavity in one of teeth. Dr. Rashmi check and suggested 4 cavity to be filled and General cleaning.  She was good but the problem is some other doctor assigned to do the job. 

One of the filling came off in 2 months and during the cleaning some of my teeth got trimmed and became much smaller and out of shape  and gaps got created between teeth. 

It’s highly irritating as I feel it everyday.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I am writing this feedback on behalf of MY
Wife RATNA GHOSH who had visited this morning and got the consultation with Dr.Rashmi Sandeep and immediately after her tooth extraction was done. This was the first experience with The Doctor in the Tooth Affair Diagonistic quite near to our residence. She found this place so amenable which is beyond description. So neat and clean and cluster of trained nurses . The Doctor is such a Pleasant Personality ,Ratna-My wife kept on admiring about her . We are fortunate to have this Outfit nearer to our Residence in CVRAMANNAGAR.

review: Dr Rashmi is explined clearly on the treatment procedure and pros and cons. Staff aproach is also good. Satisfied and recommend to all for any dental issues

tags: Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Dentists have to be responsible and provide proper estimate of the cost to their patients. Dr. Rashmi and her staff usually behaves  in a very clear manner when it comes to cost. The treatment scope is just increased unreasonably and a huge bill is handed out to the unsuspecting patients.  The lady needs to respect the fact that patients also have monthly bills to pay.  Services can be better if the cost of services is made clear upfront

tags: Wait time,
review:
Elderly patient had to wait for 1.5 hours to see the doctor despite having a prior appointment and Dr.Rashmi didn’t even see the patient.
Credit should be given to the junior doctor who does all the work
